name: Rockety Fly
description:
This is a rocket ship video game! This is controlled with A, and D (A being left and D being right) rotation steering. Then to lift the rocket in the air is to press the space bar! There is five different worlds and a winning screen. There are these black pads that don't kill you that are on the right wall on level 4 and on some spots on level 5. 

Now, these level get exceptionally harder and harder to the point of almost impossible if you complete then you're a video game god. This is game that I've created from the course on Udemy and this is what came out of it. Hope this is fun and by the way, I turned the up the difficulty exceptionally just for that Youtube like "OMG HARDEST GAME EVER" vibe. Enjoy!
